explains: adj. 有义务的，强制性的；惯常的，赶时髦的；（规定，裁决）有约束力的

sentences.en: Priority must be given to the development of obligatory activities.
sentences.cn: 必须优先发展义务活动。

sentences.en: In the mid 60s he took the almost obligatory trip to India.
sentences.cn: 六十年代中期，他也赶时髦到印度一游。

sentences.en: It is obligatory for all employees to wear protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 所有员工必须穿防护服装。
